# Introduction

`rhino` uses [`box`](https://appsilon.github.io/rhino/articles/explanation/box-modules.html) and [`renv`](https://appsilon.github.io/rhino/articles/explanation/renv-configuration.html) to manage dependencies both from the packages it uses to the interaction or relationship of codes within the app itself. `rhino` thus favor explicit over the implicit, and a local scope over  a global scope.

However, there are some instances where developers may need to use global variables in their app. In such cases, `rhino` suggests the following ways to handle global states.
